description: Inputs for Text To Image inference
title: TextToImageInput

TextToImageParameters.title: TextToImageParameters
TextToImageParameters.description: Additional inference parameters for Text To Image

guidanceScale.description: For diffusion models. A higher guidance scale value encourages the model to generate images closely linked to the text prompt at the expense of lower image quality.

negativePrompt.description: One or several prompt to guide what NOT to include in image generation.

numInferenceSteps.description: For diffusion models. The number of denoising steps. More denoising steps usually lead to a higher quality image at the expense of slower inference.

targetSize.description: The size in pixel of the output image

scheduler.description: For diffusion models. Override the scheduler with a compatible one
